column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Great friendly vibes and loved the sports memorabilia  that decorated the walls.  The staff was prompt
column2: friendly and made great recommendations on sizes/portions for the group. Now let's get to the pizza...One of my favs for Chicago deep dish.  Good ratio of cheese
column3: crust and sauce.     Recommend getting there early to help with the wait as it is very very popular.
